name: dealigee
tag_list: daily-deals, daily-deals-reseller, groupon, livingsocial, tippr, dealon
overview:
dealigee.com is a new free service that provides a safe, secure marketplace for users to buy and sell online daily deal vouchers from places like Groupon, LivingSocial, Tippr, DealOn and more. Cities currently covered include Chicago, New York City, and San Francisco. dealigee avoids a long registration process by allowing users to sign up with their Facebook ID.

Shoppers can purchase vouchers by clicking â€œbuy it nowâ€ or â€œmake an offerâ€. Making an offer is a great way to score an even better deal, since the buyer can make an offer even less than the â€œbuy it nowâ€ price set by the seller.

All buyers and sellers are validated with PayPal to ensure legitimacy of who they say they are. Payments between buyer and seller are facilitated through PayPal. In addition, there is buyer protection guaranteed from dealigee.
